.b-sch-event-wrap[data-event-id=\"5\"].title: Double click to edit
.b-sch-event-wrap[data-event-id=\"5\"].content: Or use the context menu, which on touch screens is displayed using a long press

.b-sch-header-timeaxis-cell[data-tick-in.title: Header Zoom
.b-sch-header-timeaxis-cell[data-tick-in.content: Use a drag gesture across the header to zoom into a desired time range

[data-ref=\"resourceCombo\"].content: Choose resource. New names my be typed, ENTER creates the new resource
